dcterms:creator: Xianzhi Du
David Doermann
Wael AbdAlmageed
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 189 relatively clean and high-quality signatures from 63 authors, with three signatures per author. All signatures are full signatures, meaning each contains the full name of the author.
dcterms:title: DS-I Tobacco Signature Dataset

dcterms:creator: Xianzhi Du
David Doermann
Wael AbdAlmageed
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 26,661 signatures from 887 authors. It includes both full and partial signatures with various degradations such as low quality, machine-printed texts, occlusions, and simple signatures.
dcterms:title: DS-II UMD Signature Dataset
